title: Business Card Fonts
content:
I've recently been given some business cards to recreate, this one has two fonts, neither one is anything I recognize. I know a lot of similar fonts, but not exact. Unfortunately, they need to be exact.

I'd really appreciate any help I can get.

Thank you all in advance.
